data: With jingling spurs a tall cowboy stalked out of the post-office to confront his three comrades crossing the wide street from the saloon opposite.
Grey, Zane, 1872-1939; Howard, Oscar [Illustrator]; Street, Frank, 1893-1944 [Illustrator]
